alerts.message: The required Chest X-Ray test has a 'pending' status and has not been completed. Discharge cannot proceed until this test is completed and reviewed.
alerts.suggested_action: Expedite completion of the Chest X-Ray and review results immediately.

alerts.issue_title: Critical RBC Value in Complete Blood Count
alerts.message: The Red Blood Cell (RBC) count is critically low (2.8 10^6/uL), which is below the critical threshold of 3.0 10^6/uL. This requires immediate medical attention.
alerts.suggested_action: Review RBC results with a physician and determine appropriate medical intervention before discharge. Further investigation into the cause of low RBC may be necessary.

alerts.issue_title: Critical Platelets Value in Complete Blood Count
alerts.message: The Platelets count is critically high (960 10^3/uL), which is above the critical threshold of 450 10^3/uL. This requires immediate medical attention.
alerts.suggested_action: Review Platelets results with a physician and determine appropriate medical intervention before discharge. Further investigation into the cause of high Platelets may be necessary.

alerts.issue_title: Critical Hemoglobin Value in Complete Blood Count
alerts.message: The Hemoglobin level is critically low (8.2 g/dL), which is below the critical threshold of 10.0 g/dL. This requires immediate medical attention.
alerts.suggested_action: Review Hemoglobin results with a physician and determine appropriate medical intervention before discharge. Further investigation into the cause of low Hemoglobin may be necessary.
